divs: sighting detailsi got off my bus, it was about 6:45, with my headphones still in, and headed for my school. i like to watch the the sky as i walk in because it's that nice time right before the sun rises. i was looking at the sky above the woods the turned my head towards the gym\pool building, which is to my left when i was it, it was a diamond like shape and it seemed to be glowing, it was white with a very very small hint of yellow, it looked aboout as far away as a plane would be but was much larger than a star or a plane light. it didn't flicker at all and it just sat there, i watched it as i kept walking wondering what it was, it didn't move or sway at all it just stayed still.i began to wonder if i was insane, suddenly i heard a russle in the bushes to my right i quicly looked at it hoping to catch sight of the rumored racoon that hangs around in our creek but saw nothing. i looked back to where i saw the diamond and it was still there, i looked around and no one else seemed to notice it. then i just kept staring at it in wonder, and it still did not move at all, i was starting to get a bit freaked out when i triped i looked had to look away to balance myself. i imediatly looked back to the area in the sky where i saw the diamond and it was gone, it just vanished, i looked all around the sky and didn't see it at all. now i was really freaked out and i wasn't about to tell anyone incase they might find it strange.
Summary: There was a diamond like object just sitting in the sky above my school's building.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around September 16th 2010
